p: To analyze PlBCCP family characteristics, we utilize BLASTp from NCBI non-redundant protein database to obtain its homologous genes. The conserved motifs of BCCP sequences were identified by MEME program ( http://alternate.memesuite.org/tools/mem), parameters were set as maximum of 10 misifits and an optimum motif width of 6â€“200 amino acid residues [ 91]. ClustalX was used to align all of full-length BCCP protein sequences. To construct the phylogenetic tree, MEGA7.0 software was introduced with neighbor-joining (NJ) method, bootstrap values was set as 1000 replicates.
